body: Lol Ranma is ancient. Never got into it.

This was kinda weird.  I like the "I'm a stupid girl" chalkboard thing, and also the pedobear insignia  Apparently in California the police somehow got a "tip" on that very same cuddly bear, and interpreted it to mean that it was the logo for giant conspiracy of kidnappers- they posted warnings in post offices to report it.  Mostly what they got was just normal teddy-bear sightings though lol.  Sometimes I wonder how many dudes in the FBI are pedos themselves, and use their position of authority to gank C.P. material and cover for their behavior.  "Of course I'm not a molester. I hunt molesters!"  I know the Director of the FBI (J Edgar Hoover) for ~50 years did exactly that, and ran a sex blackmail program to control all sorts of people. Funny thing is the Mafia  (allegedly) had the dirt on him too- which is why he wouldn't even acknowledge the existence of organized crime during his career there.  Also, he probably had MLK Jr shot. Not a cool dude.
